hanzi-su-wiki:
諒

Значения

Понимать, принимать во внимание

Мнемоника

Столичный 京 говор 言, в отличие от деревенского, должен быть хорошо понятен, чёток и бесхитростен.

Варианты

谅
purpleculture_pinyin:
liàng
to show understanding; to excuse; to presume; to expect
проявить понимание; извинить; предполагать; ожидать
rtega_mnemonic:
諒諒RS
谅谅		honest, fact, excuse, forgive, guess, presume
  • talk 言 from people of the capital 京 is not honest or based on facts but full of excuses and guesses; one has to forgive them
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 谅)
Pictophonetic: 京 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples: 諒解 [ liàng jiě ]: to understand; to make allowances for; understanding
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 京 [ jīng ] capital city
heisig_chinese_memo: When a Japanese person says they'll meet you at the capital, it's best to verify whether they mean Tokyo or Kyoto, unless you want them asking for forgiveness when you don't meet.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you say something the same way they say it in the capital, everyone in the whole country will be able to comprehend what you're trying to say. If you try to speak in your hometown's dialect no one will. But everyone can comprehend what you want if you use the capital's dialect to say it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine the confused faces of the people in the countryside as you try to talk to them. Decide to say it the way it's said in the capital and see their faces light up as they comprehend what you're trying to say.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Now that the townspeople finally comprehend what you were trying to say, they sell you the row (りょう) boat you were trying to buy. You were using the wrong word, but りょう is what they needed to hear to understand you, and now you can row your way back home.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture yourself rowing away in your new row boat as the townspeople wave goodbye. They were much nicer once they comprehended what you were asking for. Maybe you'll row your way back here someday.
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 亮 (あきらか、リョウ ясность, чистота; помощь).
Ru_Radicals: 亠 (крышка), 口 (рот), 小 (маленький), 言 (слово)
Ru_trainchinese: liàng: (глаг) прощать, извинять, понимать, входить в положение; полагать, думать, ожидать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the capital (京) words (言) are a fact
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The capital court will forgive you if you hire the right attorney who says the right words.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " words " to " jing ", the original meaning is honesty and honesty. "Shuowen": "Said also. Congyan, Jingsheng." "Book of Rites-Nei Ze": "Learning children's rituals in the morning and evening, please be simple and forgive." Zheng Xuan's note: "Forgiveness, letter." Jane forgive me, saying that it is more expensive to be brief and honest for those who are invited."

" Forgiveness " can express belief and trust. "Ancient and Modern Novels-Yang Qian's Guest Ferry Meets the Xia Monk": "Nevertheless, I can forgive this monk as a good man with faith and deeds, and there is absolutely nothing wrong with it."

" Forgiveness " often means understanding and understanding. "Poetry·Fengfeng·Bozhou": "Mother is also a god, don't forgive others." Gao Heng's note: "Forgive, forgive."

" Forgiveness " also expresses certainty. Han Zhengxuan's "Preface to the Book of Poetry": "The prosperity of poems cannot be forgiven in the world of the emperor." Kong Yingdashu: "The emperor is the first of the three emperors, so the emperor is the emperor.

" Forgiveness " also expressed expectation. "Yuefu Poetry Collection-Advocacy Songs One-Battle South of the City": "You will not be buried in the wild, but can the carrion escape?"
humanum_short_description_en: From the " words " and " jing " sounds, the original meaning is integrity and honesty.
humanum_full_description:
從「言」，「京」聲，本義為誠信、誠實。《說文》：「信也。从言，京聲。」《禮記‧內則》：「朝夕學幼儀，請肄簡諒。」鄭玄注：「諒，信也。」孫希旦集解：「請肄簡諒，謂所請肄習者貴乎簡要而誠實也。」

　　「諒」可表示相信、信任。《古今小說‧楊謙之客舫遇俠僧》：「雖然如此，卻也諒得過這個和尚是有信行的好漢，決無誑言之事。」

　　「諒」常表示體諒、體察。《詩‧鄘風‧柏舟》：「母也天只，不諒人只。」高亨注：「諒，原諒。」

　　「諒」也表示確實。漢鄭玄《〈詩譜〉序》：「詩之興也，諒不於上皇之世。」孔穎達疏：「上皇謂伏犧、三皇之最先者，故謂之上皇。

　　「諒」還表示料想。《樂府詩集‧鼓吹曲辭一‧戰城南》：「野死諒不葬，腐肉安能去子逃？」
humanum_short_description: 從「言」，「京」聲，本義為誠信、誠實。

諒字的基本解释

諒
liàng
见“谅”。

諒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liàng］
［《廣韻》力讓切，去漾，來。］
“谅1”的繁体字。
(1)诚信；诚实。
(2)相信；信任。
(3)固执。
(4)确实；委实。
(5)料想。
(6)体谅；体察。
(7)用同“諒節”。
(8)姓。汉有谅辅。见《後汉书》本传。
[②]［liáng］
［《集韻》吕张切，平陽，來。］
“谅2”的繁体字。
(1)通“良”。《礼记·乐记》：“致樂以治心，則易、直、子、諒之心，油然生矣。”孙希旦集解：“朱子云：'子、諒'，當從《韓詩外傳》作'慈、良'。”一说諒字仍用本义，义为诚信。孔颖达疏：“則和易、正直、子愛、誠信之心油油然從内而生矣。”
(2)古州名。唐置。

諒字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　諒； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1168第09
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】力讓切。【正韻】力仗切，?良去聲。【說文】信也。【詩·小雅】諒不我知。【鄭箋】信也。【朱傳】誠也。【禮·內則】請肄?諒。【註】言語信實也。　又小信也。【論語】豈若匹夫匹婦之爲諒也。　又【揚子·方言】愋諒，知也。【廣雅】哲也。【玉篇】相也，助也。【廣韻】佐也。【正韻】照察也。　又蠻州名。【唐書·地理志】嶺南道有諒州。　又姓。諒毅，見【戰國策】。諒輔，見【後漢·獨行傳】。　又【集韻】或作亮。【爾雅·釋詁】亮，信也。【疏】方言云：衆信曰諒。周南、召南、衞之語也。【詩·鄘風】不諒人只。【傳】諒，信也。本亦作亮。　又通作涼。【詩·大雅】涼彼武王。【傳】涼，佐也。本亦作諒。　又或作倞。【禮·郊特牲】祊之爲言倞也。【註】倞，猶索也。或爲諒。　又【集韻】【類篇】?呂張切，音良。亦同亮。信也。　又通作良。【禮·樂記】易直子諒之心。【註】子諒，朱子讀爲慈良。

小篆楷体

暂无。

Forgive
Basic explanation of words
Forgive
liàng
See "forgiveness".
Forgive
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liàng］
["Guangyun" force to cut, go to Yang, come. ]
Traditional characters for "Lang 1".
(1) Honesty; honesty.
(2) Believe; trust.
(3) Stubbornness.
(4) Indeed; confirmed.
(5) As expected.
(6) Be considerate; understand.
(7) Use the same as "forgiveness".
(8) Last name. Han has Liangsuke. See the biography of "Hou Han Shu".
[②]［liáng］
["Jiyun" Lu Zhangqie, Pingyang, come. ]
Traditional characters for "Lang 2".
(1) Through "good". "Book of Rites·Book of Music": "To bring happiness to cure the heart, then the heart of Yi, Zhi, Zi, and forgiveness, and the heart of forgiveness." "Gai Zhuan" is used as'kindness and goodness'." The word "Liu" still uses its original meaning, which means honesty. Kong Yingdashu: "The heart of harmony, integrity, love, and integrity will naturally arise from within."
(2) The name of the ancient state. Tang Zhi.
Forgive
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Youji 1] [Words Department] 　forgiveness; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1168 Page 09
【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】Strong cut. 【Zheng Yun】Strongly cut, and good sound. [Said the text] Letter also. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Forgive me for not knowing. [Zheng Jian] Letter also. [Zhu Chuan] Cheng Ye. [Li·NeiZe] Please forgive me. [Note] Faithful words are also true.　Xiaoxin also. [The Analects of Confucius] How can it be forgiveness for a husband and a wife?　[Yangtze Dialect] again, forgive me and know. [Guang Ya] Zhe Ye. [Jade articles] Xiangye, help also. [Guang Yun] Zuoya. [Zhengyun] According to the observation.　Another state name. [Book of Tang·Geography] Lingnan Road has Langzhou.　Another last name. Liang Yi, see 【Warring States Policy】. Liangfu, see [Later Han·Lone Traveling Biography].　 [Ji Yun] or Zuo Liang. 【Erya·Shiguo】Liang, Xin Ye. [Sparse] Dialect says: All faiths say forgiveness. Zhou Nan, Zhao Nan, and Wei Zhiyu also. 【Poetry·Fengfeng】Don't forgive people. [Biography] Forgive me, and believe me. This book is also bright.　It's cool again. [Poetry·Daya] Liang Bi Wu Wang. [Biography] Cool, Zuoya. Ben also forgive me.　Or do it again. 【Rite·Suburb Special Sacrifice】It's a good word. [Note] Yeah, it’s not too late. Or forgive me.　[Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? Lu Zhangqie, Yinliang. Also bright. Letter also.　Tong Sakuliang again. [Li·Le Ji] Yi Zhizi's heart of forgiveness. [Note] Ziliang, Zhu Zi is pronounced as compassionate.

Name meaning

liàng, liáng
вм. 谅
Radicals: 言, 京  (say, capital)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you say something the same way they say it in the capital, everyone in the whole country will be able to comprehend what you're trying to say. If you try to speak in your hometown's dialect no one will. But everyone can comprehend what you want if you use the capital's dialect to say it.
Imagine the confused faces of the people in the countryside as you try to talk to them. Decide to say it the way it's said in the capital and see their faces light up as they comprehend what you're trying to say.
Reading Mnemonic
Now that the townspeople finally comprehend what you were trying to say, they sell you the row (りょう) boat you were trying to buy. You were using the wrong word, but りょう is what they needed to hear to understand you, and now you can row your way back home.
Picture yourself rowing away in your new row boat as the townspeople wave goodbye. They were much nicer once they comprehended what you were asking for. Maybe you'll row your way back here someday.
